snippet: The two former officials took payments to tip off traffickers and to hinder investigations, federal prosecutors in Brooklyn said....
abstract: Former Venezuelan antidrug officials Nestor Luis Reverol and Edylberto Jose Molina are charged in New York with aiding international cocaine ring; federal prosecutors have not indicated whether they will seek to extradite both men.
lead_paragraph: The two former officials took payments to tip off traffickers and to hinder investigations, federal prosecutors in Brooklyn said.

headline.main: 2 Former Venezuelan Antidrug Officials Charged With Aiding Cocaine Ring
headline.print_headline: 2 Former Venezuelan Officials Are Charged With Aiding a Cocaine Ring
